title: 3rd QTR: Browns 3 - Raiders 20
content:
CLEVELAND - The Cleveland Browns battle the Oakland Raiders in Week 3 of their season on Sunday.  

DAWGS ON THE RUN: Mondays at 7:30 a.m. on newsnet5.com  

Both teams come in sporting a 1-1 record as they look to gain footing in their respected AFC divisions. 

You can follow all of newsnet5.com's LIVE coverage of the game here.  
 
SUBSCRIBE:   Dawgs On The Run newsletter for all the latest Cleveland Browns' news
